name: THT Web Teleconferencing
tag_list: telecommunications, international-communications, conferences, internet-messaging, training, web-storage, presentations, streaming-content
overview:
THT Web develops and deploys audio and web conferencing solutions that serve to connect individuals and groups across more than 30 countries in real-time and enable them to share and store information.

The company operates more than 24,000 ports for audio conferencing and allows users to record calls and conferences and stream them across the internet to anywhere in the world.

Audio conferences and calls require no reservation and up to 10 people can use a constant dial-in number to start a conference.

THT operators can support conferences and notify all planned participants a conference is starting.

THT’s web conferencing solutions enable individuals and firms to simultaneously share and store multiple presentations.
